text: Jürgen Schadeberg (18 March 1931Jürgen Schadeberg South African History Online – 29 August 2020Ted Botha: Famous Mandela Photographer at Drum Magazine Jürgen Schadeberg Dies sapeople.com 30 August 2020) was a German-born South African photographer and artist. He also used the name Jurgen Schademann. He photographed key moments in South African history, including iconic photographs such as Nelson Mandela as an inmate at Robben Island. He was born in Berlin. Schadeberg died on 29 August 2020 from a stroke at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:South African artists Category:German photographers
title: Jürgen Schadeberg
